li.t-if: category.is_published and category.tag_ids and any(tag.color for tag in category.tag_ids)

a.t-att-href: '/event?%s' % keep_query('*', tags=str((search_tags - tag).ids if tag in search_tags else (tag | search_tags).ids))
a.t-attf-class: dropdown-item d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between #{'active' if tag in search_tags else ''}

span.class: align-items-baseline border d-inline-flex pl-2 rounded ml16 mb-2 bg-white

a.t-attf-class: dropdown-item d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between #{searches.get('date') == date[0] and 'active'}
dropdown-item d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between #{searches.get('country') == str(country['country_id'] and country['country_id'][0]) and 'active'}

template.name: Events list

div.p: Use the top button '+ New' to create an event.

template.div: No results found for ''. Showing results for ''.

header.t-attf-class: overflow-hidden bg-secondary #{opt_events_list_columns and 'col-12' or 'col-sm-4 col-lg-3'} #{(not opt_events_list_cards) and 'shadow'}

div.t-att-class: '%s %s' % ( opt_events_list_columns and 'col-12' or 'col', opt_events_list_columns and event.event_registrations_open and not event.event_registrations_sold_out and 'h-100' or '')

h5.t-attf-class: card-title mt-2 mb-0 text-truncate #{(not event.website_published) and 'text-danger'}

span.t-attf-class: badge mr4 #{'badge-primary' if tag in search_tags else 'badge-light'} #{'o_tag_color_%s' % tag.color if tag.color else ''}

footer.t-att-class: 'small align-self-end w-100 %s %s' % ( opt_events_list_cards and 'card-footer' or (not opt_events_list_columns and 'mx-4 mt-auto pt-2') or 'py-2', opt_events_list_cards and 'border-top' or '', )

div.p: Use this paragrah to write a short text about your events or company.

p.em: Write here a quote from one of your attendees. It gives confidence in your events.

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 56px; font-weight: 900; line-height: 78px; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: center; color: #1B1B1B;margin-bottom: 50px;

li.t-if: category.is_published and category.tag_ids and any(tag.color for tag in category.tag_ids)

a.t-att-href: '/event?%s' % keep_query('*', tags=str((search_tags - tag).ids if tag in search_tags else (tag | search_tags).ids))
a.t-attf-class: dropdown-item d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between #{'active' if tag in search_tags else ''}

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 900; line-height: 19px; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; color: #5C5C5C;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-weight: 900; line-height: 24px; letter-spacing: 0em; text-align: left; color: #1B1B1B; white-space: normal;

template.name: Event Slider

div.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 45px;

div.span: ILA provides training on best practices in terms of sustainable Corporate Governance and many other relevant topics for Directors and Company Secretaries.
